author: mtosi
body:
#### PR description:

during the validation of the Phase2 tracker layout in D42 (vs D41)
we realized the <chi2/ndof> vs eta plot is available only for all the tracks,
so polluted / diluted by fakes and duplicate tracks,
@emiglior and I think the <chi2/ndof> for just the reconstructed tracks matched to a tracking particle would help in understanding the effect of the material

in addition, I realized we were missing the chi2prob distributions, ans I added them as well

last, in the current MTV version 2D plots w/ the efficiency and fake in the (pT-eta) planes are missing,
and they could be useful for checking the performance in different eta ranges

#### PR validation:
cd $CMSSW_BASE/src
scram b distclean 
git cms-checkdeps -a -A
scram b -j 24
scram b runtests

cd /tmp/tosi/
runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:
it is not, but I think it would be great if we could have a backport in each of the still opened cycles
title: [TRK Validation] add chi2 and chi2prob plots, and pT-eta plane for efficiency and fake in slices
